summary:
More useless perks and removal of necessity to by unnecessary perks.
1. All base perks that had 5 or 3 levels have only 2 levels.
2. For all Magic Schools main perks (Novice/Apprentice/Adept/Expert/Master) change spell cost NOT only for its level.
3. Some another perk requirements and tree sequences were changed.
descriptionHtml:
[b][size=3]I strongly recommend to start new game or [u]reset all perks[/u] (that were activated) with some mod.[/size][/b]
==========================================
1. All base perks that had 5 level have only 2 levels: new first is equal old first, new second is equal old fifth (skill requirement are same):

[u]Alchemist
Armsman 
Barbarian
Overdraw
Shield Wall
Juggernaut
Agile Defender
Light Fingers
Enchanter
Light Touch
Haggling[/u]

==========================================
2. For all Mage Schools (Alteration, Conjuration, Destruction,  Illusion, Restoration)  main perks (Novice/ Apprentice/ Adept/ Expert / Master) change spell cost NOT only for its level. Its change spells by next concept:

[b][size=3]Novice Perk ( skill = 00 ):[/size][/b]
    Novice spells - 50% from current cost
    Apprentice spells  - 90% from current cost
    Adept spells - 90% from current cost
    Expert  spell  - 90% from current cost
    Master spell - 90% from current cost

[b][size=3]Apprentice Perk ( skill = 25 ):[/size][/b]
    Novice spells - 90% from current cost
    Apprentice spells  - 50% from current cost
    Adept spells - 80% from current cost
    Expert  spell  - 80% from current cost
    Master spell - 80% from current cost

[b][size=3]Adept Perk ( skill = 50 ):[/size][/b]
    Novice spells - 90% from current cost
    Apprentice spells  - 90% from current cost
    Adept spells - 50% from current cost
    Expert  spell  - 80% from current cost
    Master spell - 80% from current cost

[b][size=3]Expert Perk ( skill = 75 ):[/size][/b]
    Novice spells - 90% from current cost
    Apprentice spells  - 90% from current cost
    Adept spells - 90% from current cost
    Expert  spell  - 50% from current cost
    Master spell - 80% from current cost

[b][size=3]Master Perk ( skill = 100 ):[/size][/b]
    Novice spells - 80% from current cost
    Apprentice spells  - 80% from current cost
    Adept spells - 80% from current cost
    Expert  spell  - 80% from current cost
    Master spell - 50% from current cost


==========================================
3. Some another perk requirements and tree sequences were changed:

[b][size=3]Alchemy:[/size][/b]
    - [u]Experimenter[/u] now needs 30/40/50 skill level instead 50/70/90 before

[b][size=3]OneHanded:[/size][/b]
    2 levels instead 3 (skill requirement are minor changed):
    - [u]Bladesman [/u]
    - [u]Bone Breaker[/u]
    - [u]Hack and Slash[/u]

[b][size=3]TwoHanded: [/size][/b]
    2 levels instead 3 (skill requirement are minor changed):
    - [u]Skullcrusher[/u]
    - [u]Deep Wounds[/u]
    - [u]Limbsplitter[/u]

[b][size=3]Marksman: [/size][/b]
    - Changed requirements for some perks (for example, [u]Power Shot[/u] and [u]Hunter\'s Discipline[/u] were switched, [u]Ranger[/u] was needs only [u]Overdraw[/u] )
    - [u]Bullseye[/u]: 25% instead 15%	
    - [u]Critical Shot[/u]:  2 levels instead 3 (skill requirement minor changed):

[b][size=3]Smithing:[/size][/b]
    - [u]Daedric Smithing[/u] needs [u]Dragon Armor[/u] OR [u]Ebony Smithing[/u]

[b][size=3]HeavyArmor: [/size][/b]
    - [u]Conditioning[/u] needs [u]Well Fitted[/u]

[b][size=3]LightArmor: [/size][/b]
    - [u]Deft Movement[/u] chance 15%(instead 10%)

[b][size=3]Pickpocket:[/size][/b]
    - Changed requirements for almost all perks ( For Example: [u]Poisoned[/u] and [u]Extra Pockets[/u] need only [u]Light Fingers[/u] )

[b][size=3]Lockpicking:[/size][/b]
    - [u]Quick Hands[/u], [u]GoldenTouch[/u], [u]Locksmith[/u] are need only [u]Novice Locks[/u] perk (skill requirement are same)
    - [u]Apprentice Locks[/u] and [u]Expert  Locks[/u] were removed
    - [u]Novice Locks[/u]: Novice locks are much easier to pick. Apprentice  and Adept locks are a little easier to pick
    - [u]Adept Locks[/u] : Apprentice  and Adept locks are much easier to pick, Expert and Master Locks are a little easier to pick.
    - [u]Master Locks[/u]: Expert and Master locks are much easier to pick.

[b][size=3]Sneak:[/size][/b]
    Main branch  was divided on three:
    - [u]Silent Roll[/u] needs only [u]Stealth[/u], [u]Shadow Warrior[/u] needs only [u]Silent Roll[/u] (skill requirement are same)
    - [u]Light Foot[/u] needs only [u]Stealth[/u] (skill requirement are same)
    - [u]Muffled Movement[/u] needs only [u]Stealth[/u], [u]Silence[/u] needs [u]Muffled Movement[/u] (skill requirement are same)

[b][size=3]Speechcraft:[/size][/b]
    - [u]Allure[/u] was moved to separate branch, [u]Merchant[/u] needs only [u]Haggling[/u].

[b][size=3]Alteration:[/size][/b]
    - Changed requirements for some perks (for example: [u]Atronach[/u] needs [u]Magic Resistance[/u] instead of [u]Expert Alteration[/u] and 90 skill instead of 100,  [u]Magic Resistance[/u] needs [u]Mage Armor[/u],  [u]Mage Armor[/u] needs [u]Novice Alteration[/u] )

    2 levels instead 3 (skill requirement are minor changed):
    - [u]Mage Armor[/u]
    - [u]Magic Resistance[/u]

==========================================
Author\'s Comments:
...
